description:
Designed for all-around hiking with a focus on full-day comfort and ease of use. Both the shape and the adjustable bindings optimize your stride efficiency and ergonomics without sacrificing traction or the ability to cross varied terrain.

  • SoftTec™ decking is lightweight and offers great flotation in deep snow
  • DynamicFit™ 2.0 bindings use the tried and tested BOA® Fit System
  • R2™ Articulation system maintains a natural foot position and allows for lateral flex
  • ActiveLift™ Heel lifts for comfort and efficiency when going uphill
  • Cobra™ Toe crampons provide great grip on firm snow
name: Tubbs Panoramic Snowshoes - Unisex
